messages.message: do we have any way of generating solution-level auth tokens? or something like role accounts for a given solution. if we deploy solutions with a given user's auth token and in the future that user's account is deactivated, this will break the solution.
i know core services is working on service accounts for 23.04 (which solves exactly this problem of a user getting deactivated)? not sure how urgently you need a solution, though @Vishnu
there are workarounds for this atm (creating fake accounts managed by customer). would be a cool feature to have direct from platform tho

Yea, the service accounts are users but they can't log in. Admins can create OAuth tokens for them and assign Site Permission (https://dogfood.instabase.com/apps/admin/site-permissions)s. However, we will still support disabling/deactivating service accounts.
